title: Check-in time
creator_credit: Franciscan Communications Center, Bernard Selling and Karl Holtsnider
brief_description: A film which is only incidentally about alcoholism but is, more importantly, about covenant and how one family understands it. Looks at the strengths and weaknesses of a family where the father is an alcoholic, and the way the family confronts the problem.
creator_credit_for_label: Franciscan Communications Center, Bernard Selling and Karl Holtsnider
